channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-10025] Region stuck in transition after failed RS_ZK_REGION_FAILED_OPEN
item.description:
Testing, I just ran into a case where I have a region stuck in transition. We kept trying to open the region but were failing and eventually got stuck. Looks like a block was missing so region may never have been able to open but we likely shouldn't have the region stuck in transition.

Here is some log snippet from master side only showing lines that mention the region that is failing:


 31 2013-11-25 12:30:56,111 DEBUG [AM.ZK.Worker-pool2-t366] master.AssignmentManager: Handling RS_ZK_REGION_FAILED_OPEN, server=c2023.halxg.cloudera.com,60020,1385405351397, region=d1485bc64a1a9246908e6af38a89b973, current_state={d1485bc64a1a9246908e6af38a89b973 state=OPENING, ts=1385411440853, server=c2023.halxg.cloudera.com,60020,1385405351397}

 30 2013-11-25 12:30:56,111 INFO  [AM.ZK.Worker-pool2-t366] master.RegionStates: Transitioned {d1485bc64a1a9246908e6af38a89b973 state=OPENING, ts=1385411440853, server=c2023.halxg.cloudera.com,60020,1385405351397} to {d1485bc64a1a9246908e6af38a89b973 state=CLOSED, ts=1385411456111, server=c2023.halxg.cloudera.com,60020,1385405351397}

2013-11-25 12:31:27,433 DEBUG [RS_OPEN_REGION-c2024:60020-0] zookeeper.ZKAssign: regionserver:60020-0x1429097f3410003, quorum=c2020.halxg.cloudera.com:2181, baseZNode=/hbase Transitioned node d1485bc64a1a9246908e6af38a89b973 from RS_ZK_REGION_OPENING to RS_ZK_REGION_FAILED_OPEN
item.summary: Region stuck in transition after failed RS_ZK_REGION_FAILED_OPEN

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.

comments.comment: Restoring the datanode that had failed completed block and then forcing assign got me going again.

The reason for the region stuck in transition in this case is to let OPS know it. Otherwise, it will be a surprise to them if they find out some region is not assigned and not shown in the web UI. The other choice is to not stuck it in transition, but put it somewhere so we can show it in web UI.
Jimmy Xiang Thanks for taking a look. Sounds reasonable. Why did we stop assigning? How does that mechanism work? Should we write up something for ops on how to find and fix this kind of scenario?

Sometimes, some issue is not recoverable so we retry for a certain number (configurable) and move the region to failed_open state. It assumes some ops task is needed before it can be assigned. We thought about adding some info to web UI about the cause of failed_open to help ops. But we don't have a chance to work on it yet.
Thanks Jimmy Xiang Is there an issue for adding prob to UI? That'd be coolio. I'd close this then.

(information in case someone stumbles upon this jira on encountering this issue.)
this should be fixed by assignment manager work being done in HBASE-14350.
